page.title: 04Vicar, Sutton-cum-Lound
page.content: There are two churches in this area. There is one at Lound called St. Annes and one at Sutton called St. Bartholomews. The vicar is called Father Bob. He lives in a vicarage at Sutton. His parish, which is in the estate of the Duke of Portland, goes up to the River Idle. Father Bob goes round to visit sick and old people in this area and also in Worksop, Sheffield and Lincoln. He also visits schools, old peoples homes and hospitals. Father Bob has been a vicar for thirty years. He has been vicar of Sutton and Lound for about six years. Tiln lies on the other side of the River Idle and is in the parish of Clarborough and Hayton.
